column6: "THE END OF HISTORY" 3 (OF 4) The Fury - an alien cybernetic lifeform that's indestructible, unpredictable and infinitely adaptable. How will Wolverine, Storm and Nightcrawler cope when it turns their own teammate, Sage, against them?
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | colorist:Frank D'Armata | inker:Mark Farmer
